org.apache.mesos.offer.constrain

Class AgentRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.offer.constrain.AgentRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlacementRule

    public class AgentRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlacementRule
    This rule enforces that a task be placed on a provided agent ID, or enforces that the task avoid that agent ID.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AgentRule.AvoidAgentGenerator
      Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on the specified agent ID.
      static class  AgentRule.AvoidAgentsGenerator
      Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on any of the specified agent IDs.
      static class  AgentRule.RequireAgentGenerator
      Ensures that the given Offer is located on the specified agent ID.
      static class  AgentRule.RequireAgentsGenerator
      Ensures that the given Offer is located on one of the specified agent IDs.

      Offer filter(Offer offer)

      • AgentRule

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public Offer filter(Offer offer)
        Description copied from interface: PlacementRule
        Returns a copy of that Offer with any disallowed Resources filtered out, or may return the original Offer without copying if everything passes the filter. If the entire Offer is rejected, the return value will be a non-null Offer with zero Resources.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface PlacementRule
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer to be examined
        Returns:
        either the uncopied input as-is, or a copy of the input with zero or more Resources stripped out

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
